admin-description: Can edit the organization and manage billing.
card-description-invite-link: Invite team members to your organization. You can generate an invite link here. After generating the link, it will be valid for 48 hours. Simply send it to your team members and they will be able to join your organization by clicking it.
go-to-link: Go to the invite link's page
new-link-deactivates-old: Generating a new link automatically deactivates the old one.
owner-description: Can assign roles and delete the organization.
